snippet: The fire was partly contained, officials said, and the medical examiner released preliminary autopsy results for the 19 firefighters who died in the blaze.
abstract: Arizona officials say wildfire in Maricopa County is 80 percent contained, and are hopeful residents can be allowed back into their homes within next several days; medical examiner says 19 firefighters killed in blaze died from burns, smoke inhalation or combination of both.
lead_paragraph: The fire was partly contained, officials said, and the medical examiner released preliminary autopsy results for the 19 firefighters who died in the blaze.

headline.main: Crews in Arizona Make Progress in Subduing Deadly Fire
headline.print_headline: Crews Make Progress In Subduing Deadly Fire
